name: Word Chomp
description:
Word Chomp

Spell words by picking up letters, but watch out for enemies!

How to Play

Click play and use the arrow keys to move.

More Info

  • This game was made for The Odin Project's first game jam with the theme Edutainment. 
  • Contributors: mbeckdev (github), Ceki (github), and CamOz
  • Music and sound effects from https://www.zapsplat.com/
